```{r homework 1 Q6}
set.seed(19990318)
U <- runif(1000, 0, 1)
gamma = 2
beta = 5 
# inverse CDF F^{-1}
x = (-beta*log(1-U))^(1/gamma)
hist(U,main = "Uniform")
hist (x, main =" Simulated Weibull ")

plot(dweibull(1000, 2, 5 ))


```
